testDesigns.name: Modern Login Page
testDesigns.description: A clean, modern login page with a centered card containing email/password fields, a sign-in button, and forgot password link. Use a gradient background from blue to purple.

testDesigns.name: E-commerce Product Grid
testDesigns.description: A product grid layout showing 6 product cards in a 2x3 grid. Each card has a product image, title, price, and add to cart button. Include a search bar at the top.

testDesigns.name: Corporate Landing Page
testDesigns.description: A professional landing page with a navigation bar, hero section with large text and CTA button, features section with 3 columns, and footer. Use corporate blue and white color scheme.

testDesigns.name: Mobile App Settings
testDesigns.description: A mobile settings screen with user profile at top, followed by grouped settings options like account, notifications, privacy, help. Include toggle switches and forward arrows.

testDesigns.name: Data Dashboard
testDesigns.description: A data dashboard with multiple charts and graphs. Include a top navigation, sidebar menu, and main content area with 4 different chart types: bar chart, line graph, pie chart, and data table.

testDesigns.name: Social Media Post
testDesigns.description: A social media post card with user avatar, name, timestamp, post text, image, and interaction buttons (like, comment, share). Use rounded corners and subtle shadows.
